tr_quotes.quote: Vazife duygusu, en büyük terbiyeci güçtür.
tr_quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

tr_quotes.quote: Ahlak, kelimenin en geniş anlamıyla canı olan her şeye karşı duyulan sorumluluk demektir.
tr_quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

tr_quotes.quote: Bizzat sorumluluk yüklemek ve düşünmek istemeyenlerin lidere ihtiyaçları vardır.
tr_quotes.author: Hermann Hesse

tr_quotes.quote: Sorumluluk, insanı eğitir.
tr_quotes.author: Wendell Phillips

tr_quotes.quote: Sorumluluğunu taşıyacağın fikrin insanı ol.
tr_quotes.author: A.Hamdi Tanpınar

tr_quotes.quote: Her insan herkes karşısında her şeyden sorumludur.
tr_quotes.author: Dostoyevski

tr_quotes.quote: Sorumluluğu kabul edebilmek, insanın değerinin ölçütüdür.
tr_quotes.author: Roy L. Smith

tr_quotes.quote: Doruğa doğru çıktıkça; hayat güçleşir, risk artar, sorumluluk çoğalır.
tr_quotes.author: F.Nietzsche

tr_quotes.quote: Disiplin, gaye ile başarıyı bağlayan köprüdür.
tr_quotes.author: Jim Rohn

tr_quotes.quote: Sorumlusu olmadığımız şartlara verdiğimiz tepkilerden sorumluyuz.
tr_quotes.author: Allan Massie

tr_quotes.quote: Yalnız yaptıklarımızdan değil, yapmadıklarımızdan da sorumluyuz.
tr_quotes.author: Jean B. Moliere

tr_quotes.quote: Yaşama karşı sorumluluğumuz; daha yücesini yaratmaktır, daha alçağını değil.
tr_quotes.author: F.Nietzsche

tr_quotes.quote: Düzgün bir insan olabilmek için, sorumluluk üstlenen birisi olmak gerekir.
tr_quotes.author: Antoine de Saint Exupery

tr_quotes.quote: Öz sorumluluk, başkalarına verdiğimiz sözlerin yanı sıra, kendimize verdiğimiz sözleri de yerine getirmek demektir.
tr_quotes.author: Andre Gide

tr_quotes.quote: Hiç kimse, hem sorumluluk hem de umutsuzluk hissine aynı anda kapılamaz.
tr_quotes.author: Antoine de Saint Exupery

tr_quotes.quote: Disiplin her şeyden önce gelir.
tr_quotes.author: Aleksandr Puşkin

tr_quotes.quote: Her disiplinli çabanın birden çok ürünü vardır.
tr_quotes.author: Jim Rohn

tr_quotes.quote: Göğe ulaşıp yanıma kadar gelmek mi istiyorsun? Uçmak için iki kanadını birden kullan: bir disiplin, öbürü merhamet.
tr_quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

tr_quotes.quote: Disiplin başarının esasıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Atatürk

tr_quotes.quote: Doğru eğitim disiplin ister.
tr_quotes.author: Ayşe Kulin

tr_quotes.quote: Düzenli ve yerleşik ilişki aslında bir disiplin işidir.
tr_quotes.author: Buket Uzuner

tr_quotes.quote: Gerçek bilgi, disiplinli ve denenmiş bilgidir.
tr_quotes.author: Cemil Meriç

tr_quotes.quote: Hayatın her çalışma safhasında olduğu gibi, özellikle öğretim hayatında, sıkı disiplin başarının şartıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Atatürk

tr_quotes.quote: Öğrencinin ilk çalışması çalışmayı öğrenmektir, zekanın eğitimine giden yol, iradenin disiplininden geçer.
tr_quotes.author: Andre Maurois

tr_quotes.quote: Disiplin, büyük başarılar elde etme konusunda insanoğlu için bir çeşit kutsal eldir!
tr_quotes.author: Mehmet Murat İldan

tr_quotes.quote: Disiplinin sırrı motivasyondur, bir kişi yeterince motive edilmişse, disiplin kendi kendine sağlanır.
tr_quotes.author: Sir Alexander Paterson

tr_quotes.quote: Disiplin, yeteneği beceriye dönüştüren şekillendirici bir ateştir.
tr_quotes.author: Roy Smith

tr_quotes.quote: Erdemli insan, başkalarına emir vermekten ziyade, kendini disipline etmeye çalışır.
tr_quotes.author: Lao Tzu

tr_quotes.quote: Başarı yalnız yetenek değil, disiplin, özveri, bağımsız ve ödünsüz bir kişilik, içten bir yurt ve insan sevgisi gerektirir. Ancak o zaman, gerçek ve hak edilmiş bir başarı olur.
tr_quotes.author: Atilla İlhan

tr_quotes.quote: Kendine saygı disiplinin meyvesidir, haysiyet birine hayır diyebildikçe büyür.
tr_quotes.author: Abraham J.Heschel

tr_quotes.quote: Hepimizin hayalleri var. Ancak hayalleri gerçeğe dönüştürmek için çok fazla kararlılık, özveri, öz disiplin ve çaba gerekir.
tr_quotes.author: Jesse Owens

tr_quotes.quote: Gerçekten ne olduğumuzu, yeteneklerimizden çok daha fazlasını gösteren seçeneklerimizdir.
tr_quotes.author: JK Rowling

tr_quotes.quote: Öz-disiplin, yapmak istemediğinizde bile yapılması gerektiğinde yapılması gerekeni yapıyor.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Öz disiplin eksikliği için mazeretler yapmak kolaydır, ancak mazeretler sizi hiçbir yere götürmez.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Başarı düzeyiniz, öz disiplin ve azim seviyenize göre belirlenir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Öz disiplin yoluyla özgürlük gelir.
tr_quotes.author: Aristo

tr_quotes.quote: Hayatımda ancak öz disiplinle başarıya ulaşabilirim ve bunu dileğim ve iradem bir olana kadar uyguladım.
tr_quotes.author: Nikola Tesla

tr_quotes.quote: Tekrar tekrar yaptığımız şeyiz. O zaman mükemmellik bir eylem değil, bir alışkanlıktır.
tr_quotes.author: Aristo

tr_quotes.quote: Fikrini yönet yoksa seni yönetir.
tr_quotes.author: Horace

tr_quotes.quote: Eğer doğruluk ve öz disipline göre hareket ederseniz, barış ve mutluluk zihninizi derinlemesine dolduracaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Gobind Singh

tr_quotes.quote: Disiplin, bir yandan da nefs terbiyesidir.
tr_quotes.author: Nasuh Mahruki

tr_quotes.quote: Her disiplinli çabanın birden çok ürünü vardır.
tr_quotes.author: Jim Rohn

tr_quotes.quote: Disiplinin acısına katlan ya da pişmanlığın acısına.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Düzeni zekâ sağlar, disiplin değil.
tr_quotes.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

tr_quotes.quote: Gerçek bilgi, disiplinli ve denenmiş bilgidir.
tr_quotes.author: Cemil Meriç

tr_quotes.quote: Disiplin ve konsantrasyon ilgilenip ilgilenmediğiniz meselesidir.
tr_quotes.author: Tom Kite

tr_quotes.quote: Her disiplin eksikliği kendini engellemeye ve kendinden iğrenmeye dönüşür.
tr_quotes.author: Maria Champian

tr_quotes.quote: Disiplin, büyük başarılar elde etme konusunda insanoğlu için bir çeşit kutsal eldir.
tr_quotes.author: Mehmet Murat İldan

tr_quotes.quote: Yanlışlık bizim ilerlememize yardım eden disiplin kollarından biridir.
tr_quotes.author: William Ellery Channing

tr_quotes.quote: Disiplin, iradeden düzene, yasadan dengeye kadar her şeyi kapsar.
tr_quotes.author: Delia Steinberg Guzman

tr_quotes.quote: Disiplinin sırrı motivasyondur, bir kişi yeterince motive edilmişse, disiplin kendi kendine sağlanır.
tr_quotes.author: Alexander Paterson

tr_quotes.quote: Sahte düzensizlik mükemmel disiplin gerektirir, sahte korku cesaret gerektirir, sahte zayıflık güç gerektirir.
tr_quotes.author: Sun Tzu

tr_quotes.quote: Hayatımda başarılı olmamın tek yolu disiplinden geçiyordu. Ben de arzularımla iradem bir olana kadar kendi üstümde disiplin uyguladım.
tr_quotes.author: Nikola Tesla

tr_quotes.quote: Öğrencinin ilk çalışması çalışmayı öğrenmektir, zekanın eğitimine giden yol, iradenin disiplininden geçer.
tr_quotes.author: Andre Maurois

tr_quotes.quote: Disiplin bir ordunun ruhudur, o küçük topluluğu yenmesi zor bir hale sokar, zayıflara başarı sağlar, bütün orduya saygı toplar.
tr_quotes.author: George Washington

en_quotes.quote: Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishment.
en_quotes.author: Jim Rohn

en_quotes.quote: If you wish to be out front, then act as if you were behind.
en_quotes.author: Lao Tzu

en_quotes.quote: We do today what they won’t, so tomorrow we can accomplish what they can’t.
en_quotes.author: Dwayne ‘The Rock’ Johnson

en_quotes.quote: Winners embrace hard work. They love the discipline of it, the trade-off they’re making to win. Losers, on the other hand, see it as a punishment. And that’s the difference.
en_quotes.author: Lou Holtz

en_quotes.quote: Discipline is the soul of an army. It makes small numbers formidable; procures success to the weak, and esteem to all.
en_quotes.author: George Washington

en_quotes.quote: A disciplined mind leads to happiness, and an undisciplined mind leads to suffering.
en_quotes.author: Dalai Lama

en_quotes.quote: The successful person has the habit of doing the things failures don’t like to do. They don’t like doing them either necessarily. But their disliking is subordinated to the strength of their purpose.
en_quotes.author: E.M. Gray

en_quotes.quote: The only discipline that lasts is self-discipline.
en_quotes.author: Bum Philips

en_quotes.quote: Discipline is the refining fire by which talent becomes ability.
en_quotes.author: Roy L. Smith

en_quotes.quote: With self-discipline, most anything is possible.
en_quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

en_quotes.quote: If I want to be great I have to win the victory over myself…self-discipline.
en_quotes.author: Harry S. Truman

en_quotes.quote: We must all suffer one of two things: the pain of discipline or the pain of regret and disappointment.
en_quotes.author: Jim Rohn

en_quotes.quote: I could only achieve success in my life through self-discipline, and I applied it until my wish and my will became one.
en_quotes.author: Nikola Tesla

en_quotes.quote: Self-command is the main discipline.
en_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

en_quotes.quote: One discipline always leads to another discipline.
en_quotes.author: Jim Rohn

en_quotes.quote: Without self-discipline, success is impossible, period.
en_quotes.author: Lou Holtz

en_quotes.quote: He who lives without discipline dies without honor.
en_quotes.author: Icelandic Proverb

en_quotes.quote: The price of excellence is discipline. The cost of mediocrity is disappointment.
en_quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

en_quotes.quote: You have power over your mind, not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength.
en_quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

en_quotes.quote: Self-discipline is the No.1 delineating factor between the rich, the middle class, and the poor.
en_quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

en_quotes.quote: Confidence comes from discipline and training.
en_quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

en_quotes.quote: Success is a matter of understanding and religiously practicing specific simple habits that always lead to success.
en_quotes.author: Robjert J. Ringer

en_quotes.quote: Success doesn’t just happen. You have to be intentional about it, and that takes discipline.
en_quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

en_quotes.quote: No man is fit to command another that cannot command himself.
en_quotes.author: William Penn

en_quotes.quote: Discipline is the foundation of a successful and happy life.
True freedom is impossible without a mind made free by discipline.
en_quotes.author: Mortimer J. Adler

en_quotes.quote: Self-control is the chief element in self-respect, and self-respect is the chief element in courage.
en_quotes.author: Thucydides

en_quotes.quote: The first and greatest victory is to conquer self.
en_quotes.author: Plato

en_quotes.quote: We must do our work for its own sake, not for fortune or attention or applause.
en_quotes.author: Steven Pressfield

en_quotes.quote: One painful duty fulfilled makes the next plainer and easier.
en_quotes.author: Hellen Keller

en_quotes.quote: Self-respect is the fruit of discipline; the sense of dignity grows with the ability to say no to oneself.
en_quotes.author: Abraham J. Heschel

en_quotes.quote: Do not consider painful what is good for you.
en_quotes.author: Euripides

en_quotes.quote: Those who have nothing have only their discipline.
en_quotes.author: Alain Badiou

en_quotes.quote: Success is nothing more than a few simple disciplines, practiced every day.
en_quotes.author: Jim Rohn

en_quotes.quote: It is time to reverse this prejudice against conscious effort and to see the powers we gain through practice and discipline as eminently inspiring and even miraculous.
en_quotes.author: Robert Greene

en_quotes.quote: With this magic ingredient, you can accomplish anything and everything you want to, and it is called self-discipline.
en_quotes.author: Brian Tracy

en_quotes.quote: Do not bite at the bait of pleasure till you know there is no hook beneath it.
en_quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

en_quotes.quote: Great leaders always have self-discipline -without exception.
en_quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

en_quotes.quote: Mental toughness is many things and rather difficult to explain. Its qualities are sacrifice and self-denial. Also, most importantly, it is combined with a perfectly disciplined will that refuses to give in. It’s a state of mind-you could call it character in action.
en_quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

en_quotes.quote: Respect your efforts, respect yourself. Self-respect leads to self-discipline. When you have both firmly under your belt, that’s real power.
en_quotes.author: Clint Eastwood

en_quotes.quote: Success is actually a short race – a sprint fueled by discipline just long enough for habit to kick in and take over.”
en_quotes.author: Gary Keller

en_quotes.quote: By constant self-discipline and self-control you can develop greatness of character.
en_quotes.author: Grenville Kleiser

en_quotes.quote: He who cannot obey himself will be commanded. That is the nature of living creatures.
en_quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

en_quotes.quote: Most powerful is he who has himself in his own power.
en_quotes.author: Seneca

en_quotes.quote: It is not enough to have great qualities; We should also have the management of them.
en_quotes.author: La Rochefoucauld

en_quotes.quote: Discipline really means our ability to get ourselves to do things when we don’t want to.
en_quotes.author: Arden Mahlberg

en_quotes.quote: Your level of success is determined by your level of discipline and perseverance.
That aim in life is highest which requires the highest and finest discipline.
en_quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

en_quotes.quote: Self-discipline is about controlling your desires and impulses while staying focused on what needs to get done to achieve your goal.
en_quotes.author: Adam Sicinski

en_quotes.quote: All successes begin with self-discipline. It starts with you.
en_quotes.author: Dwayne “The Rock” Johnson

en_quotes.quote: Discipline is choosing between what you want now and what you want most.
en_quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

en_quotes.quote: Respect your efforts, respect yourself. Self-respect leads to self-discipline. When you have both firmly under your belt, that’s real power.
en_quotes.author: Clint Eastwood

en_quotes.quote: Winners embrace hard work. They love the discipline of it, the trade-off they’re making to win. Losers, on the other hand, see it as a punishment. And that’s the difference.
en_quotes.author: Lou Holtz

en_quotes.quote: Whether you call it Buddhism or another religion, self-discipline, that’s important. Self-discipline with awareness of consequences.
en_quotes.author: Dalai Lama

en_quotes.quote: A disciplined mind leads to happiness, and an undisciplined mind leads to suffering.
en_quotes.author: Dalai Lama

en_quotes.quote: He who cannot obey himself will be commanded. That is the nature of living creatures.
en_quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

en_quotes.quote: You can never conquer the mountain. You can only conquer yourself.
en_quotes.author: Jim Whittaker

en_quotes.quote: I value self-discipline but creating systems that make it next to impossible to misbehave is more reliable than self-control.
en_quotes.author: Tim Ferriss

en_quotes.quote: Mastering others is strength. Mastering yourself is true power.
en_quotes.author: Lao Tzu

en_quotes.quote: Self-discipline is what separates the winners and the losers.
en_quotes.author: Thomas Peterffy

en_quotes.quote: Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishment.
en_quotes.author: Jim Rohn

en_quotes.quote: We are what we repeatedly do, excellence then is not an act, but a habit.
en_quotes.author: Aristotle

en_quotes.quote: In reading the lives of great men, I found that the first victory they won was over themselves… self-discipline with all of them came first.
en_quotes.author: Harry S Truman

en_quotes.quote: Self-command is the main discipline.
en_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

en_quotes.quote: We do today what they won’t, so tomorrow we can accomplish what they can’t.
en_quotes.author: Dwayne Johnson

en_quotes.quote: It's all right letting yourself go, as long as you can get yourself back.
en_quotes.author: Mick Jagger

en_quotes.quote: Rule your mind or it will rule you.
en_quotes.author: Horace

en_quotes.quote: Talent without discipline is like an octopus on roller skates.
en_quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

en_quotes.quote: It is better to conquer self than to win a thousand battles.
en_quotes.author: Buddha

en_quotes.quote: Mastery of impulse is all about self-discipline and choice. The mind is a powerful tool with which we have the ability to be in control of ourselves.
en_quotes.author: Alaric Hutchinson

en_quotes.quote: If I couldn't have discipline, if I sit up eatin' fried chicken in bed at night, I'd just as soon be dead. I take care of myself
en_quotes.author: Jim Brown

en_quotes.quote: It takes relentless self-discipline to schedule suffering into your day, every day.
en_quotes.author: David Goggins

en_quotes.quote: Success isn't measured by money or power or social rank. Success is measured by your discipline and inner peace.
en_quotes.author: Mike Ditka

en_quotes.quote: Whatever you abuse will return to hunt you. Cultivate the self-discipline to use everything within the environment God created them for.
en_quotes.author: Paul Bamikole

en_quotes.quote: I'm a grazer by nature - fruit, nuts - but I try to discipline myself and sit down for regular meals when the girls are around, as I want to instil good habits in them.
en_quotes.author: Darcey Bussell

en_quotes.quote: I kind of peak at how far I can push my body, and then I run out of determination for the habit and start easing off. It's really just a lack of focus and discipline
en_quotes.author: Sean Astin

en_quotes.quote: Discipline and unconditional support is earned by understanding and trust and inclusion. Not by isolation, not by nasty tricks.
en_quotes.author: Colm Keaveney

en_quotes.quote: That's why the point isn't to become smarter, but to become more self-disciplined.
en_quotes.author: Adam Kirk Smith

en_quotes.quote: It is often the simple daily practices that influence our lives in dramatic ways.
en_quotes.author: Alaric Hutchinson

en_quotes.quote: Liberty depends on self-restraint. Freedom is freedom only when controlled and limited.
en_quotes.author: Edith Hamilton

en_quotes.quote: The road to character is built by confronting your own weakness.
en_quotes.author: David Brooks

en_quotes.quote: I believe in discipline, so I'm not the right person to cry about weakness and things like this, but maybe I'm not human.
en_quotes.author: John Galliano

en_quotes.quote: I'm just always looking forward. I spend very little time, looking backward.
en_quotes.author: Gary Vee

en_quotes.quote: An attitude of positive expectation is the mark of the superior personality.
en_quotes.author: Brian Tracy

en_quotes.quote: Depression in failure should never go to heart, and ego in success should never go to the brain
en_quotes.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

en_quotes.quote: Confucianism is all about tempering your instincts with intellectual discipline, with book learning.
en_quotes.author: Brian Reynolds Myers

en_quotes.quote: You need three things to win: discipline, hard work and, before everything maybe, commitment. No one will make it without those three.
en_quotes.author: Haile Gebrselassie

en_quotes.quote: Having a strong sense of self-discipline helps us to avoid negativity and achieve the greatness we desire.
en_quotes.author: Amr Okasha

en_quotes.quote: Discipline may be identified neither with an institution nor with an apparatus; it is a type of power, a modality for its exercise, comprising a whole set of instruments, techniques, procedures, levels of application, targets; it is a 'physics' or 'anatomy' of power, a technology.
en_quotes.author: Michel Foucault

en_quotes.quote: I have to play with discipline in midfield.
en_quotes.author: Memphis Depay

en_quotes.quote: The discipline of desire is the background of character.
en_quotes.author: John Locke

en_quotes.quote: Discipline is money in the bank. A real friend, true strength.
en_quotes.author: Henry Rollins

en_quotes.quote: If a man can control his mind he can find the way to Enlightenment, and all wisdom and virtue will naturally come to him.
en_quotes.author: Buddha

en_quotes.quote: Discipline is the refining fire by which talent becomes ability
en_quotes.author: Roy L. Smith

en_quotes.quote: I never met a person as determined as my mother.
en_quotes.author: Sugar Ray Leonard

en_quotes.quote: Great teaching requires incredible talent and dedication, strong intellectual ability and interpersonal skills, real discipline and empathy.
en_quotes.author: Bruce Rauner

en_quotes.quote: It is foolish to be lavish in words and niggardly in truth.
en_quotes.author: Charles Haddon Spurgeon

en_quotes.quote: If you have control over yourself, you have no desire to control others.
en_quotes.author: Miya Yamanouchi

en_quotes.quote: Without self-discipline, potentials are useless and mediocrity becomes the plague of life.
en_quotes.author: Clement Ogedegbe

en_quotes.quote: A disciplined mind leads to happiness.
en_quotes.author: Dalai Lama

en_quotes.quote: Veterans have the skills employers want - discipline, motivation, leadership, and the ability to work on a team. They have made the U.S. military the most effective and respected in the world.
en_quotes.author: Bobby Kotick

en_quotes.quote: It is in my nature to give the work I have all the discipline and due diligence that I am capable of.
en_quotes.author: Priyanka Chopra

en_quotes.quote: By constant self-discipline and self-control, you can develop greatness of character.
en_quotes.author: Grenville Kleiser

en_quotes.quote: Overcoming the pain of self-discipline, we achieve our goals and move towards our dreams.
en_quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

en_quotes.quote: Self-discipline is self-caring.
en_quotes.author: M. Scott Peck

en_quotes.quote: Waking up early maintains your self-discipline. Get up and read, workout, journal, meditate or grind. How you start the day sets the tone.
en_quotes.author: Genereux Philip

en_quotes.quote: think you can judge from somebody's actions a kind of a stability and sense of purpose perhaps created by strong religious roots. I mean, there's a certain patience, a certain discipline, I think, that religion helps you achieve.
en_quotes.author: George W. Bush

en_quotes.quote: Without any self-sacrifice, how can there be a success?
en_quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

en_quotes.quote: No person is free who is not master of himself.
en_quotes.author: Epictetus

en_quotes.quote: I think self-discipline is something, it's like a muscle. The more you exercise it, the stronger it gets.
en_quotes.author: Daniel Goldstein

en_quotes.quote: I believed in studying just because I knew education was a privilege. It was the discipline of study.
en_quotes.author: Wynton Marsalis

en_quotes.quote: Your legacy is being written by yourself. Make the right decisions.
en_quotes.author: Gary Vee

en_quotes.quote: There is one thing that gets you out of bed in the morning, and that is discipline. Because your dreams and your goals are not there waking up for you in the morning.
en_quotes.author: Jocko Willink

en_quotes.quote: The philosophy of fasting calls upon us to know ourselves, to master ourselves, and to discipline ourselves the better to free ourselves. To fast is to identify our dependencies, and free ourselves from them.
en_quotes.author: Tariq Ramadan

en_quotes.quote: Mine is just a simple old human story - of one person trying, with great rigor and discipline.
en_quotes.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

en_quotes.quote: Most people want to avoid pain, and discipline is usually painful.
en_quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

en_quotes.quote: Many people think they want things, but they don't really have the strength, the discipline. They are weak. I believe that you get what you want if you want it badly enough.
en_quotes.author: Sophia Loren

en_quotes.quote: We must all suffer one of two things: the pain of discipline or the pain of regret or disappointment.
en_quotes.author: Jim Rohn

en_quotes.quote: JROTC students make a commitment to serve their communities at an early age, and they learn the discipline and habits to be future leaders.
en_quotes.author: Conor Lamb

en_quotes.quote: The discipline of writing something down is the first step toward making it happen.
en_quotes.author: Lee Iacocca

en_quotes.quote: In order to be responsible, you need some discipline in your life.
en_quotes.author: Donatella Versace

en_quotes.quote: The time that leads to mastery is dependent on the intensity of our focus.
en_quotes.author: Robert Greene

en_quotes.quote: In reading the lives of great men, I found that the first victory they won was over themselves…self-discipline with all of them came first.
en_quotes.author: Harry S. Truman

en_quotes.quote: I count him braver who overcomes his desires than him who conquers his enemies; for the hardest victory is over self.
en_quotes.author: Aristotle

en_quotes.quote: Self-discipline is about controlling your desires and impulses while staying focused on what needs to get done to achieve your goal.
en_quotes.author: Adam Sicinski

en_quotes.quote: Success is created through the performance of a few small daily disciplines that stack up over time to produce achievements far beyond anything you could have ever planned for.
en_quotes.author: Robin Sharma

en_quotes.quote: It doesn't matter whether you are pursuing success in business, sports, the arts, or life in general: The bridge between wishing and accomplishing is discipline.
en_quotes.author: Harvey Mackay

en_quotes.quote: Failure is nothing more than the inevitable outcome of a few small acts of daily neglect performed consistently over time so that they take you past the point of no return.
en_quotes.author: Robin Sharma

en_quotes.quote: With self-discipline, most anything is possible.
en_quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

en_quotes.quote: I could only achieve success in my life through self-discipline, and I applied it until my wish and my will became one.
en_quotes.author: Nikola Tesla

en_quotes.quote: Self-control is the key to self-esteem and self-confidence.
en_quotes.author: Laurance McGraw

en_quotes.quote: Confidence comes from discipline and training.
en_quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

en_quotes.quote: Success is actually a short race – a sprint fueled by discipline just long enough for habit to kick in and take over.
en_quotes.author: Gary Keller

en_quotes.quote: Self-discipline is the No.1 delineating factor between the rich, the middle class, and the poor.
en_quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

en_quotes.quote: Self-control is strength, right thought is mastery, calmness is power.
en_quotes.author: James Allen

en_quotes.quote: It is time to reverse this prejudice against conscious effort and to see the powers we gain through practice and discipline as eminently inspiring and even miraculous.
en_quotes.author: Robert Greene

en_quotes.quote: With this magic ingredient, you can accomplish anything and everything you want to, and it is called self-discipline.
en_quotes.author: Brian Tracy

en_quotes.quote: The more I disciplined myself to take notice of the good things in life, the more I began to recognize just how much there is to be thankful for
en_quotes.author: Krystal Kuehn

en_quotes.quote: The individual who wants to reach the top in business must appreciate the might and force of habit.
en_quotes.author: J. Paul Getty

en_quotes.quote: The fact is, discipline is only punishment when imposed on you by someone else. When you discipline yourself, it's not punishment but empowerment.
en_quotes.author: Les Brown

en_quotes.quote: Let's not be afraid to speak the common sense truth: you can't have high standards without good discipline.
en_quotes.author: William Hague

en_quotes.quote: Success is a matter of understanding and religiously practicing specific, simple habits that always lead to success.
en_quotes.author: Robert Ringer

en_quotes.quote: Without hustle, your talent will only get you so far.
en_quotes.author: Gary Vee

en_quotes.quote: He who cannot establish dominion over himself will have no dominion over others.
en_quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

en_quotes.quote: The first and greatest victory is to conquer self.
en_quotes.author: Plato

en_quotes.quote: I think self-discipline is something, it's like a muscle. The more you exercise it, the stronger it gets
en_quotes.author: Daniel Goldstein

en_quotes.quote: Self-discipline is that which, next to virtue, truly and essentially raises one man above another.
en_quotes.author: Joseph Addiso

en_quotes.quote: Never believe a promise from a man or woman who has no discipline. They have broken a thousand promises to themselves, and they break their promise for you.
en_quotes.author: Matthew Kelly

en_quotes.quote: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.
en_quotes.author: Will Durant

en_quotes.quote: One discipline always leads to another discipline.
en_quotes.author: Jim Rohn

en_quotes.quote: Motivation gets you going, but discipline keeps you growing.
en_quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

en_quotes.quote: Self-discipline begins with the mastery of thought. If you do not control your thoughts, you cannot control your needs
en_quotes.author: Napoleon Hil

en_quotes.quote: You have power over your mind, not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength.
en_quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

en_quotes.quote: Self-discipline calls for a balancing of the emotions of your heart with the reasoning faculty of your head
en_quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

en_quotes.quote: True freedom is impossible without a mind made free by discipline.
en_quotes.author: Mortimer J. Adler

en_quotes.quote: Great leaders always have self-discipline -without exception.
en_quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

en_quotes.quote: Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishment.
en_quotes.author: Jim Rohn

en_quotes.quote: The whole reason I did a bodybuilding show was to see how far I could push my own discipline. It was the hardest thing I've ever done.
en_quotes.author: Matt McGorry

en_quotes.quote: Simply, self-discipline enables you to think first and act afterward.
en_quotes.author: Napoleon Hil

en_quotes.quote: Winners embrace hard work. They love the discipline of it, the trade-off they're making to win. Losers, on the other hand, see it as a punishment. And that's the difference
en_quotes.author: Lou Holtz

en_quotes.quote: It's a lot more than mind over matter.
en_quotes.author: David Goggins

en_quotes.quote: The great master key to riches is nothing more or less than the self-discipline necessary to help you take full and complete possession of your own mind.
en_quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

en_quotes.quote: By constant self-discipline and self-control you can develop greatness of character
en_quotes.author: Grenville Kleise

en_quotes.quote: Trophies should go to the winners. Self-esteem does not lead to success in life. Self-discipline and self-control do, and sports can help teach those.
en_quotes.author: Roy Baumeister

en_quotes.quote: Without self-discipline, success is impossible, period.
en_quotes.author: Lou Holtz

en_quotes.quote: Success is nothing more than a few simple disciplines, practiced every day.
en_quotes.author: Jim Rohn

en_quotes.quote: When a man is sufficiently motivated, discipline will take care of itself.
en_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

en_quotes.quote: Small disciplines repeated with consistency every day lead to great achievements gained slowly over time.
en_quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

en_quotes.quote: Self-discipline is an act of cultivation. It requires you to connect today's actions to tomorrow's results.
en_quotes.author: Gary Ryan Blair
